name: Name
all_books: book in sum | books in sum
clean_up_desc: Immediately deletes all books marked as sold or removed. Usually those books will be automatically deleted after a few days.
conditions_desc: All books can have a condition assigned. Only admins are allowed to create new conditions. Removing a condition, results in books without a condition.
branchNameHelp: The name is shown in the filters, the public search and on other places.
branchStepsHelp: The price of a book can be increased and decreased in fixed steps.
branchOrderingHelp: How customers can purchase the book. This text is shown in the public search for every book.
branchOrderByHelp: How to sort genres throughout the app.
branchPublicHelp: Whether you want to appear in the public search or not.
inventoryDesc: After creating a new inventory you will see a new button in the search. In Inventory Mode you can mark books as found and not found. Closing an inventory means marking all not found books as removed and reset inventory state on all books.
pricelistDesc: Define a price and depending on properties you can increase or decrease the price.
priceCalcReleaseYearHelp: Use keypairs like YEAR:PRICE e.g. 2021:-1. One entry per line.
priceCalcConditionHelp: Use keypairs like CONDITION_ID:PRICE e.g. 1:2. One entry per line.
formats_desc: Everyone can see formats, but only admins can create new ones or delete existing formats.
activateCartHelp: Are users allowed to add books to the cart?
content_help: The content will be shown on the shop's homepage. A subset of Markdown and HTML is allowed.
announcements_desc: Announcements can be edited by admins and shown by all. For now the announcement is visible only in the settings section of the app.
title: Title
tags_desc: Everyone can see tags and create new ones, but only admins can edit or delete existing tags.
